spells.name: Allfood
spells.description: Turns item up to 5 lbs./level into food.

spells.name: Arrow Eruption
spells.description: Creates duplicates of an arrow used to kill a creature in the previous round.

spells.name: Bloodhound
spells.description: Gives caster the scent special ability.

spells.name: Campfire Wall
spells.description: Creates a shelter around a campfire.

spells.name: Chameleon Stride
spells.description: Gives a +4 bonus on Stealth checks and concealment.

spells.name: Create Treasure Map
spells.description: Creates treasure map out of a creature's corpse.

spells.name: Eagle Eye
spells.description: Creates a magical sensor high above you.

spells.name: Guiding Star
spells.description: Know approximate distance from where you cast this spell.

spells.name: Hide Campsite
spells.description: Hides all traces of your campsite.

spells.name: Hunter's Eye
spells.description: +20 on Perception checks to locate a target.

spells.name: Lockjaw
spells.description: Gives creature grab ability with a natural attack.

spells.name: Stone Call
spells.description: 2d6 damage to all creatures in area.
